mapper.select: select t.staff_id, t.sname,t.ttype, ap.pname as afterpost_name, bp.pname as beforepost_name, DATE_FORMAT(t.tdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as tdate1,DATE_FORMAT(t.opdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as opdate1 from transfer t, post bp, post ap where t.beforepost_id = bp.id and t.afterpost_id = ap.id
select s.sname as sname, p.id as beforepost_id, p.pname as beforepost_name from staff s, post p where s.id = #{staff_id} and s.post_id = p.id
